title: WebSocket API Cognito Authentication using Lambda Authorizer
description: This pattern demonstrates how to integrate Cognito authentication with Amazon API Gateway WebSocket API.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates how to integrate Cognito authentication with Amazon API Gateway WebSocket API.

It includes the Lambda implementations for Lambda Authorizer, Lambda functions for $connect, $disconnect and custom route, and AWS Serverless Application Model (SAM) code to deploy backend infrastructure.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Ankush Jain
authors.bio: Application Development Consultant at AWS Professional Services.
